_configuration_guide: 1. RECOMMENDED for most users: Enable 'notification', 'stop', and 'subagent_stop'
2. Enable 'pretooluse' only if you want notifications before EVERY tool execution
3. 'posttooluse' is very noisy - enable only for debugging purposes
4. To use custom audio: Place MP3 files in audio/custom/ and update paths above
6. Run scripts/test-audio.sh to test your setup
7. Remember to restart Claude Code after making changes
